item.description:
Ron Paul has designated Bruce Fein as his spokesman.  Bruce Fein, as you may remember, is the Constitutional Lawyer:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_fein

Radio show will stream at Noon, Monday 11/14 at www.wpkn.org.

Ron Paul spokesman Bruce Fein. Bruce will be our guest on In Context on Monday, November 14 at noon on WPKN, 89.5 FM, Bridgeport, CT streaming at www.wpkn.org. 

We'll be taking calls and we'll announce the number during the show.  Also, listeners can email us at ken@mdrtalk.org before or during the show and we'll read their questions or comments on the air.   Gus and I would very appreciate if you let people know about Bruce's appearance and that we would be happy to hear from them during the show.  

Ken MacDermotRoe

Greenwich, Connecticut
